price: এতেকে যদি সিহঁত বিৰত হয় তেন্তে নিশ্চয় আল্লাহ ক্ষমাশীল, পৰম দয়ালু।
arabic: فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
